heading: HR00905
0:
A RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE, DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT, DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT, COMMISSION ON
HIGHER EDUCATION, AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION AND SKILLS DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, TO ESTABLISH AND APPROPRIATE FUNDS FOR SUBSIDY
AND LOAN PROGRAMS FOR THE TEACHING AND NON-TEACHING STAFF AND
PERSONNEL OF PRIVATE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS, AND CONTRACTUAL
AND JOB ORDER TEACHING AND NON-TEACHING STAFF AND PERSONNEL OF
THE PUBLIC EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS IN TIMES OF STATE EMERGENCIES, CALAMITIES, AND OTHER SIMILAR CIRCUMSTANCES
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00905
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE, DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT, DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT, COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION, AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION AND SKILLS DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, TO ESTABLISH AND APPROPRIATE FUNDS FOR SUBSIDY AND LOAN PROGRAMS FOR THE TEACHING AND NON-TEACHING STAFF AND PERSONNEL OF PRIVATE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS, AND CONTRACTUAL AND JOB ORDER TEACHING AND NON-TEACHING STAFF AND PERSONNEL OF THE PUBLIC EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS IN TIMES OF STATE EMERGENCIES, CALAMITIES, AND OTHER SIMILAR CIRCUMSTANCES
